title: dark mode permanently on for contact and phone while automatic mode set on device
content:
While I haven't changed any settings, my contacts and phone app on pixel 3XL are now permanently on dark mode.
On each app, the display setting says "Dark mode in device settings is on" I cannot do anything to this line.
The device display setting is set to "automatic". changing this to light, dark mode, or automatic has no incidence on the contact or phone, which remain in dark mode.
I changed the wall paper, this also had no effect.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3 XL
